JOB DESCRIPTION: Requirements:    Minimum 2+ years experience in Data Warehouse design and development for large-scale BI applications on Oracle Data Warehouse.      Minimum 2+ years experience with star schemas, dimensional modeling, and extract transform load (ETL) design and development.      Experience developing packages, procedures, views and triggers.      Database Administration. Expertise working with various databases (Oracle, SQL Server)      Nice to have: exposure to big data technologies      The individual must have full technical knowledge for all phases of a software development lifecycle and must be able to analyze and solve complex problems in a dynamic environment.      This individual must have good oral and written communication skills.      This individual must have development experience with ETL tools.      Nice to have: SSIS/Pentaho ETL.
